website_summaries.verdict: The best mass gainer to choose if you want the most results and control over the size, flavor, and style of the mass gainer.
pros: Comes in several different varieties for you to pick the best recipe for your workout efforts
8 different flavors include vanilla, banana, triple berry, and strawberry
Different sizes allow you to choose a large supply or something small to keep on hand as a snack
cons: Adds an unexpected amount of mass in a short amount of time in some cases

customer_reviews.title: A Mass Gainer That Works + Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I've seen solid strength and size gains with 0 fat/bloating issues. I do not use this product as a meal supplement but rather use it to add additional calories to my already high-caloric diet. I have a high metabolism and this has abled me to get past my plateau's without needing to change anything in my workouts. Mixing Tip: Let your just-made shake sit for 5 additional minutes before consuming and shake/mix again just before drinking it. I've had a lot of success with making it very liquidy by letting it sit for a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Oh man..
customer_reviews.text: The macro and micro specs on this bottle are great. The price is great, the calories and protein and carbs are great. The stuff just taste like butt. I am a hard gainer, i lift heavy heavy, and i never do cardio. I still struggle to look normal, im just super skinny. I can see results in the gym, strength wise, but never size. I get stronger gradually and build endurance, i just cant gain weight. Its just genetics. Mass gainers do help, ive gained about 15lbs with various mass gainers, and this one is fine. Again, its just gross. Its sickeningly sweet, with a hint of butt flavor. i got the chochlate, cant finish the bottle. Too gross.
customer_reviews.author: Trace C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. A mass gainer that isn’t all sugar. It’s incredibly tasty- especially when made with coconut milk. I bought this because I have digestive issues and needed something to keep weight on because as an athlete, I can’t be losing weight rapidly because I can’t eat. This definitely helped maintain weight for me and helped with lean gains as well once I got healthier
customer_reviews.author: Mj R.

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate peanut butter. Taste amazing. Here’s the deal. I did only 2 scoops and it’s SUPER thick. I only recommend 2scoops at MAX per one shake. The scoop is huge too. This is day one and I’m going to update every 2 weeks on physical performance. Put it in a blender, let it sit for a minute or two, no chunks. 🤟🏽
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quantity for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been through many of mass gainers and regular protein shakes. This one i would have to say ranks the lowest out of all the ones I've tried. Unfortunately i bought a 12lb bag based off of other reviews. I would suggest if you try this to get a smaller one. This protein shake has an odd taste, Kinda has a kick at the end like its salty? As others have stated you do kinda have to let it sit and soak or else you will be drinking powder clumps. Overall I think I will have to stay away from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t even tasted it and I’m already not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to gain mass as the jug indicates. Directions state to mix 4 scoops into either water or milk. First of all, the actual scoop is huge and 4 of these bad boys fills up my cup. So the first 4 scoops I wasted because I couldn’t get it to mix. I then added a scoop, some water, then another scoop, etc. I swear I shook my cup for 10-15 minutes and I was still getting huge clumps. You guys over at Muscle Pharm might want to think about adding, “may need to use blender to mix properly” on your products, or at least this one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Inman

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This At All.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using mass gainer, and when I realized how big the four scoops were (that is when I found the scoop hidden later), I knew something was off. The flavor is not at all pleasant, and I cannot ingest it without feeling sick. The aftertaste is terrible and it won't go away. This is well among the worst purchasing decisions I made. I can't even continue using this product despite having a lot left and having wasted money on two of these thinking it would help me reach my goals. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Malik Lendell

customer_reviews.title: Delicious with water!
customer_reviews.text: This is the *first* protein powder I have ever used that actually tastes better with water than it does with milk. When using water, it mixes almost perfectly, but with milk it will not fully mix...no matter how much shacking you do (blender bottle). The flavor is better than serious mass when using water but when using milk--it doesn't hold a candle to SM. All in all, not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor however made me feel way too bloated and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor however made me feel way too bloated and had some digestion issues with it. Probably the maltodextrin in it.
customer_reviews.author: RPK_91

customer_reviews.title: Works well and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Helping my husband gain weight. I use it to make his morning shakes. I only use one scoop because following the directions would be way too thick. My husband says it tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: A Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: True mass gainer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Guys this product really works if you’re skinny and want to gain weight. I’ve gone up from 135 to 151 lbs in a better of 8 months I would say. You do have to lift but I’ve done that before but never got to be this heavy. I terms of taste, it could be better. I don’t like chololate so I tried but vanilla which is too sweet for my taste but I’m seeing results so I’m willing to just deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeDC

customer_reviews.title: Poor mixing, crap packaging
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good, if you can get beyond the enormous amount of unmixed chunks of powder! Seriously, I expected way more from Muscle Pharm. This stuff mixes like cheap garbage. The suggested use has you mixing four scoops with 18-20 oz. of water (or milk)... ONE scoop would not mix completely in 18 oz. so you can imagine what would happen to 4x that amount. Oh, and last talk about packaging... the "zip lock" feature within the bag is completely misaligned making it near impossible to reseal once opened. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product, as a supplement, in order to gain weight. It taste great but just like all protein/weight and muscle mass powder drinks, you must use a good portion each and every time. I have an eating disorder due to a history of esophageal cancer so weight gainers such as this one are an essential part of my diet. So far, I’m happy with it and the flavor is very good.
customer_reviews.author: jeodee

customer_reviews.title: Getting results!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a weakling 130 pound man and took this stuff for my high metabolism- bam 💥 140 in 2 months stuff feels like glue on your hands and tase like it to but yeah it gets results fast.. can’t wait till restock
customer_reviews.author: MoeManReese

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat MusclePharm!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product as prescribed 4 scoops and 18-20 oz of milk or water or milk. I drink it right out of the blender. Did a challenge with other Mass gainers and MusclePharm is the best. It seemed like within a week gains other brands well......If you like wasting money go ahead...Me and my team Muscle Pharm all the way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Strange taste, but easy to blend
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate taste is pretty strange. It sort of had a chemical like taste. It does blend very well though, even with a blender bottle. This is not the best tasting protein powder that I've had, but it isn't horrible. The serving scoop is smaller than other mass gainer products. I probably would not buy it again since there are other better tasting products.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Good product it is exactly as it’s described
customer_reviews.text: Good product. These things always fluctuate in price so can’t ever say it’s a good value. But it is definitely better value than going to any store and purchasing! Good product is exactly as it’s described.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Fissel

customer_reviews.title: Best Supplement to supplement
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate flavor mass gainer and it tastes great. I don't recommend trying to fit the four scoops that comes as one serving into a shaker bottle however. Like most mass gainers, these should be used as small caloric 'boosts' in a person's diet, and not as a calorie blaster. I've used half a serving daily, mixed with water and soy milk, and I've gained about 5 pounds in two weeks. Some muscle, some flab, but that's what happens when go into a caloric surplus. Very great product nevertheless, and the price is great in comparison to the other competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great morning  breakfast shakes
customer_reviews.text: Testing out this new powder so far I like it labors pretty good are use it for my morning shakes combined with other ingredients oatmeal and peanut butter and ice cream and Honey I get around 2700 cal
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Get yours!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I'm talking about! Tastes good and results is great, with consistent use. I only drink it once a day in the mornings. I wouldn't buy anything else, seriously. Get yours before it sells out again!
customer_reviews.author: La-Laa

customer_reviews.title: Package tore and half of the bag is gone
customer_reviews.text: Well I just got my package of my mass gainer... was excited to get it. When I opened it there was a tear across the seal and half of it was all in my box it came in... I'm a bit disappointed and worried to try it.. what a bummer really was looking forward to having some decent gainer.
customer_reviews.author: Heath B.

customer_reviews.title: Really not necessary
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I kinda think it is not necessary. Just eat more normal carbs and meat/egg/tofu... I bought it to fill up my caloric deficient window, but I found that I need four cups of this sticky shake to give ~1000 kcal... (I thought only one shake ~ 1000 kcal before the purchase) Flavor is okay, which is pretty similar to ON WHEY protein shake. I got stomach discomfort after drinking so I stopped pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: FuRui Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Mass will be gained
customer_reviews.text: Deserves 5 stars because it does what it says. You will gain mass. However, it does clump up a bit (at least the chocolate peanut butter). On the bright side, the chunks are like eating really thick peanut butter. I also noticed it took some time for my stomach to adjust to the protein. Not necessarily bloating but actual stomach discomfort. Nothing I didn't get over a couple of days. Overall, very good product for what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: isaak

customer_reviews.title: I read in the 10 commandments of swoleness I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I read in the 10 commandments of swoleness I tried to get big gains. After taking this consistently for the past month I became Arnold Schwarzenegger. However, after using the elliptical and treadmill I lost all my gains. I'm hoping to return to the muscle farm(Pharm) to get more Gainers of the mass because I need to be swole for the summer. #Summerbodygoals2018 #Letsgetit.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Park

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it makes me gassy af. I mean putrid stinkers. It mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW C.DUDLEY

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and creamy. No chunks!
customer_reviews.text: This mixes so much better than the vanilla and tastes like bottled chocolate milk. SO good. I’ll buy this over vanilla due to the fact that it is smoother and less chunky. Freeze it for 15 mins and it is amazing. With just one shake a day I have gained 5 lbs over the last month. I am a woman who has issues gaining weight so this has been great for me and my high metabolism :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: There’s room for improvement but overall it’s a good mass gainer
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t mix that well with the shaker, I come from gold standard protein which mixed within a few seconds. Flavor is not that great when you have chunks in protein in your mouth. I wish it had a bit more protein and less carbs per serving. (60 protein, 220 carbs) I think would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Ferrusco

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: The price I paid for the product wasn’t so bad. In fact it was great. Now in my experience I haven’t seen the expected results using this product. Despite eating more than I usually would it didn’t work for more as much as I would’ve liked it to. But the product does work! Flavor is good, I prefer it with milk and you can choose when to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: 4 big scoops
customer_reviews.text: 4 gigantic scoops... i feel like im chugging toothpaste its so thick. It definitely was misleading witgh 1270 calories. Its actually 317 per scoop. I guess if you want a huge glass you can use 4. I will be searching elsewhere for something better.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Only giving 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 3 stars because my husband uses it. I don’t think he cares for the taste or the fact that it mixes like sludge, as long as he sees results which is to gain. Tastes like artificial flavoring (like sweet n low) and does NOT mix well or easily. Sticks to the sides of whatever you’re trying to mix it in.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Combat XL has quickly become a necessity in my daily stack. From the very first day of using it post workout you can FEEL your muscles being saturated with everything they need and more. Short term goals have been met now I'm looking months ahead thanks to MP.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but doesn't taste or mix well at all. I have to add some Coco powder for the taste, and mixing in a blender is a must. I get better results from using regular protein shakes with something like carbolean (maltodextrin, dextrose and waxy maize) throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: smokey.pine

customer_reviews.title: Package came with a tear.
customer_reviews.text: The package came in a large box. However after opening it with my hands I found white powder all over. The plastic bag that this comes in had a slit/tear towards the bottom which cause the spill. We found out about this when we lifted the bag out of the box and the white powder spilled everywhere. I didn’t allow my boys to use it because of possible tampering. We have heard the product tastes great and it is a good brand, but not when it comes with a tear.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Use a blender, tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate peanut butter actually tastes good, not like other protein shakes! My husband is using it to gain weight, he just doesn’t eat enough for his metabolism. It seems to be working! I like to make it in batches to store in the fridge, a blender makes getting all the powder mixed in a lot easier than stirring or shaking.
customer_reviews.author: eirefire22

customer_reviews.title: The best compared to the rest.
customer_reviews.text: I make my protein shake with mass gainer, oatmeal, almond milk and sometimes include scoops of cookies and cream ice cream and its by far the best protein to use if you want to enjoy your consumptions.
customer_reviews.author: Ronney A.

customer_reviews.title: Great protein at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Curbs hunger after a workout. Very inexpensive compared to the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, got a good deal on it. Been taking this for a while now, Im a extreme hard gainer, love the fact that its one of the more cleaner products out without the unwanted crap. Seeing some great results, for a slightly cheaper budget, this product is awesome. Maintain a proper diet, try to keep up with your needed calories per day, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: wilfred

customer_reviews.title: If you want results buy it. If you dont go buy the cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. You can buy the cheap stuff and hate your results or you can buy this have great flavor and put the weight on.
customer_reviews.author: James Overly

customer_reviews.title: High quality and excellently priced
customer_reviews.text: Two scoops makes it have an extra sweet, slightly bitter after taste which can get to be too much for me. Mixing it with milk it tastes much better. I still like it, because I need a ton a protein to work through my day.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to mix.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He has lost weight b/c of illness and I have been mixing this in a shake. It is helping and I add fruits and ice cream to make it richer.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing this mass gainer for a while now and it really helped me a lot. I only put 2 scoops at 16-18 oz of water since putting more than that makes my drink really thick and hard to swallow. I’m a skinny dude and I’ve gained more than 20 lbs with lean muscle and I also do a lot of running and do a lot of physical workout at end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most delicious protein I ever had and the only protein I ever drink I personally love the chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening shipping box and attempting to remove the bag of protein, powder leaked through the side of the bag and emptied into the box. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best weight gainer but if u buy protein and carb powder it will be way cheaper and same thing more serving
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Worse than Competitors
customer_reviews.text: Chose this product as a change from Optimum Nutrition’s mass gainer. A half serving doesn’t mix well at all in a protein shaker unlike ON where I have no problem mixing half a serving, whole milk and even peanut butter in a shaker bottle. It’s the same price and calorie count so I’d just buy ON
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Taste is AWFUL, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worst tasting mass gainer I have ever tried. Literally a complete waste of money. I had to force myself through the serving and could not possibly have another serving. I ended up throwing the entire container away. Not only did it taste bad, but it tasted like straight sugar. Like pounds of sugar mixed into a drink. Don’t do it to yourself.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Bag came in the mail with a tear in it, didn't lose too much protein but still annoying that the product spilled before receiving. Serving size is also 4 scoops, a lot of powder per serving. Also annoying that I couldn't find the scooper until a few weeks in of usage, was buried in the bottom. Good flavor though.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: I cut back on how much powder used and it went down better.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous powder, this asks for larger scoops per 8 oz of water. First time using it, threw it up within an hour. I cut back on how much powder used and it went down better.
customer_reviews.author: Addy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Husband's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. This is his favorite mass gainer. I use it sometimes too. It mixes well, has a great taste, and I like the macro's on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Cross

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate is OK
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate is okay, not the best but I've had much worse. Easily shaken with 1/2 size serving. They're all the same, just buy whichever is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Plan zero

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Protein
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla has a nice smooth taste to it & no bad aftertaste. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This mass gainer does definitely work. The only issue i really have with it is the flavor and consistency. The chocolate flavor i could tolerate but the vanilla was disgusting. I had to stop taking it halfway through my second jar because i was having some issues digesting it. I think for the price you can’t really go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Saige

customer_reviews.title: Shupping damaged products
customer_reviews.text: Box wasn't damaged but the protein supplement package was. So I got shipped a damaged product. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Braum

customer_reviews.title: Helps when you cant eat enough
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price if you have trouble eating enough to put on weight this stuff will do the trick it is alot to do in one sitting but split it into two shakes a day and its not bad to take down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This powder is great! It has multiple proteins and complex carbs too. It tastes pretty good. It digests very well even at higher volume shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes great . I just have no been consistent with my weight gain process but it really helps me fill in calories and get protein intake.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable/ Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: So instructions say 4 scoops, yet just 2 scoops makes the drink extremely sweet, nasty. Tried mixing it with all different fruits and the taste is just unbearable. Save your money!!! Go to Gnc!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gainer
customer_reviews.text: I've been able to gain weight using this product, I love the chocolate flavor too! The only reason I give it a 4/5 is because this thing is impossible to mix. You have to use a blender or split it up into 4 separate drinks just to gulp it down, even then sometimes there is chunks. Overall though its a great gainer and does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Simpson

customer_reviews.title: BAG DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated my bag also came with 2 rips in it and the outside box was perfectly fine. There is clearly an issue with the warehouses for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaw

customer_reviews.title: To much product per serving.
customer_reviews.text: Have to use a lot of product per serving. Hard to get clumps out. Only lasted 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Wm88

customer_reviews.title: I like this Peanut butter and chocolate flavor a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this Peanut butter and chocolate flavor a lot. Its not chalky at all. It is a big tub. And one serving is 4 scoops and the scooper is a 5oz scoop. That's huge! I only do 2 scoops and it is perfectly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tamashii

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: The product is great mixed with water as directed. I use 1% milk.The bag is the size of a 60lbs bag of concrete. I have a super high metabolism and use it for the calories. I gave it 4 stars because mixing it without lumps is tough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Hole in bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, however it came with a hole in the bag and alot of the product is spilled in the box it came in. I also don’t feel comfortable using something that is “open” I don’t feel it’s safe to use
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: HUGE SCOOPS
customer_reviews.text: Uhhhh, so I just got this today. Went to the Gym earlier and decided lets see what this is like. Each serving is 4 scoops. Each scoop is HUGE. I turned about 20 oz of water damn near into a solid after adding all that powder. It better help me add a few pounds and I don't mean fat either.
customer_reviews.author: Teon Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there
customer_reviews.text: Does not dissolve very well very paste like substance . Better products available.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: It works. Trust me...i used a scale!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I have been trying to gain weight for years without supplementing. I finally put on a few(healthy) pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: taste good but have to shake really well to avoid the lumps
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and mixes well in a blender bottle with water
customer_reviews.text: Helped me put on 10 lbs within a couple of months while taking 2-3 scoops per day. Tastes great and mixes well in a blender bottle with water. I will purchase again next bulking cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It smells well with milk and the taste of chocolate is not bad, anyway I can only judge the quality of the product but the results can help you but you have to be trained to have the desired results.
customer_reviews.author: DOM

customer_reviews.title: check your labels and servings
customer_reviews.text: you have to fill a tall glass with just powder for one serving, this will be made into 3 shakes, are you going to drink three additional shakes a day? misleading product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste is gross
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered chocolate-it’s disgusting....the vanilla is ok...now have big thing of chocolate will never drink...
customer_reviews.author: lisa hammond

customer_reviews.title: Careful of sugar content!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 3 star because whilst it has a lot of good ingredients it is high in sugar compared to many other mass gainers
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Amazing taste too
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Amazing taste too. Mix with milk and tastes like chocolate pudding !
customer_reviews.author: TheBlackBandit

customer_reviews.title: my husband loves this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it. He adds it to his oatmeal and smoothies
customer_reviews.author: IbroFam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my father to increase his weight. It works perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bag 2/10. Basics of the product 8/10. Not happy, not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was definitely not what I was expecting.( my fault ) but also the zipper on top broke after I first opened the bag. Made it almost impossible to move anywhere else without it spilling everywhere. Overall not a bad product though.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and works!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Great protein that tastes good and works.
customer_reviews.author: david large

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn’t dissolve well.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not dissolve very good but other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet, makes you feel full and can cause nausea
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to drink this with the recommended serving size. Taste is too sugary and makes you feel really full and might cause some nausea. I recommend using half a serving if mixing with water.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksa Arsic

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes great, it is not chalky, but there are black/brown rock like substances throughout the entire protein powder that make it very undesirable. When you feel that first hard rock in your mouth it almost makes you gag. I returned the product and would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Booth

customer_reviews.title: Blend it.. if you don’t have a blender then try using a blender bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I’ve only been drinking it for about a week so I have weighed myself yet but the taste is amazing. I have chocolate peanut butter I drink it with whole milk and I add a scoop of peanut butter then I blend it.
customer_reviews.author: khyanni Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Gainer
customer_reviews.text: Love it but a little bit of sugar in it then I would like to have.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was the bag it came in , wouldn’t reseal , might just been defective , I had to scoop it into another container . But other than that great product .
customer_reviews.author: Ezmi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Price to amount is good value. Packs a punch of calories. Taste okay
customer_reviews.author: SYFARHAT

customer_reviews.title: MILKSHAKE
customer_reviews.text: Great product for putting on weight. I used it twice a day for the last 2 months and gained 10-15lbs. Taste great, mixes good.
customer_reviews.author: John Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: A Big Surprise
customer_reviews.text: The container is huge, I'll update my review after it's gone. I'll only use scoops for now
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great price

customer_reviews.title: the beast
customer_reviews.text: the beast, this is amazing, you can see the results, the taste is awesome and combine with the combat protein powder you will be a monster in the gym

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and how easy is to mix with your favorite drink after workouts or just to take in the morning for breakfast. I love the price too. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: I like the Muscle pharm but the only problem is that ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the Muscle pharm but the only problem is that it taste more Egg so be careful if you are taking it with milk and I am taking only one full spoon in the morning and one in the evening which is very strong. Overall the result is nice

product_meta.title: MusclePharm Combat XL Mass Gainer Powder, Weight Gainer Protein Powder, Vanilla, 6 Pounds, 8+ Servings
product_meta.description: Color:Vanilla| Size:6 Pound (Pack of 1)Combat XL Mass Gainer 6lb 6 lbs Vanilla (EACH).
feature_bullets: POWERFUL PROTEIN POWDER: MusclePharm Combat XL is a revolutionary weight-gaining supplement, formulated with dense, functional calories, protein, carbohydrates, and essential nutrients.

SMART WEIGHT-GAIN POWDER: This mass-gainer protein powder features essential fatty acids, complex carbohydrates, and four sources of protein that work together to promote muscle recovery, which allows you to get big and stay big
TRANSPARENT INGREDIENTS: Combat XL Mass Gainer Powder features MCTS, flax, and chia seeds, 1270 calories, 50 grams of protein, and 252 grams of carbohydrates per serving for maximum weight gain
100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: All MusclePharm products are backed by a 30-day full money-back guarantee

BANNED-SUBSTANCE TESTED and certified by Informed-Choice. Athletes who see the Informed-Choice logo on a product can be assured it has undergone rigorous checks and testing to ensure that it is not contaminated with banned substances and is safe to use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
